com.badlogic.gdx.ai.utils

Class CircularBuffer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.utils.CircularBuffer<T>

  • public class CircularBuffer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A circular buffer, possibly resizable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CircularBuffer(int initialCapacity)
      Creates a resizable CircularBuffer with the given initial capacity.
      CircularBuffer(int initialCapacity, boolean resizable)
      Creates a CircularBuffer with the given initial capacity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if this circular buffer is empty; false otherwise.
      boolean isFull()
      Returns true if this circular buffer contains as many items as its capacity; false otherwise.
      boolean isResizable()
      Returns true if this circular buffer can be resized; false otherwise.
      T read()
      Removes and returns the item at the head of this circular buffer (if any).
      protected void resize(int newCapacity)
      Creates a new backing array with the specified capacity containing the current items.
      void setResizable(boolean resizable)
      Sets the flag specifying whether this circular buffer can be resized or not.
      int size()
      Returns the number of elements in this circular buffer.
      boolean store(T item)
      Adds the given item to the tail of this circular buffer.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CircularBuffer

        public CircularBuffer(int initialCapacity)
        Creates a resizable CircularBuffer with the given initial capacity.
        Parameters:
        initialCapacity - the initial capacity of this circular buffer

      • CircularBuffer

        public CircularBuffer(int initialCapacity,
                      boolean resizable)
        Creates a CircularBuffer with the given initial capacity.
        Parameters:
        initialCapacity - the initial capacity of this circular buffer
        resizable - whether this buffer is resizable or has fixed capacity

    • Method Detail

      • store

        public boolean store(T item)
        Adds the given item to the tail of this circular buffer.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to add
        Returns:
        true if the item has been successfully added to this circular buffer; false otherwise.

      • read

        public T read()
        Removes and returns the item at the head of this circular buffer (if any).
        Returns:
        the item just removed or null if this circular buffer is empty.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if this circular buffer is empty; false otherwise.

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Returns true if this circular buffer contains as many items as its capacity; false otherwise.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of elements in this circular buffer.

      • isResizable

        public boolean isResizable()
        Returns true if this circular buffer can be resized; false otherwise.

      • setResizable

        public void setResizable(boolean resizable)
        Sets the flag specifying whether this circular buffer can be resized or not.
        Parameters:
        resizable - the flag

      • resize

        protected void resize(int newCapacity)
        Creates a new backing array with the specified capacity containing the current items.
